Race.SpecificTitle: Village of Dry Prong -- 1% S&U Tax - M&BOA - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Village of Dry Prong, Louisiana ("Village") be authorized to levy and collect a one-percent tax ("Tax") upon the sale at retail, use, lease or rental, consumption, and storage for use or consumption of tangible personal property and on sales of services in the Village, all as defined by law, with the Tax proceeds (after paying reasonable, necessary costs and expenses of collecting and administering the Tax) (estimated $53,000.00 reasonably expected to be collected from the levy annually), to be dedicated and used for any lawful corporate purpose; the Tax beginning January 1, 2021, to be in lieu of a one-percent sales and use tax now being levied through December 31, 2029 by the Village dedicated and used for the purpose of resurfacing streets within the Village except those under jurisdiction of parish and state; and shall the Village be authorized to fund the Tax proceeds into bonds to be issued from time to time for any lawful corporate purpose to the extent and in the manner permitted by the laws of Louisiana, including Louisiana Revised Statutes of 1950, Sub-Part F, Part III, Chapter 4, Title 39, as amended?
